scripts.start: echo 'Please see loaders.gl website for how to run examples' && open http://uber.github.io/loaders.gl/#/documentation/getting-started/examples
scripts.clean: rm -fr dist dist-es6 && mkdir -p dist/es5 dist/esm dist/es6
scripts.build: npm run clean && webpack && npm run build-es6 && npm run build-esm && npm run build-es5 && npm run build-size
scripts.build-size: (echo "source size" ; find src/ -name '*.js' | xargs cat | wc -c) && (echo "dist/es6 size" ; find dist/es6 -name '*.js' | xargs cat | wc -c) && (echo "dist esm size" ; find dist/esm -name '*.js' | xargs cat | wc -c) && (echo "dist es5 size" ; find dist/es5 -name '*.js' | xargs cat | wc -c)
scripts.cover: NODE_ENV=test nyc --reporter html --reporter cobertura --reporter=lcov npm run test-cover
scripts.lint: eslint src test && npm run lint-yarn
scripts.lint-yarn: !(grep -q unpm.u yarn.lock) || (echo 'Please rebuild yarn.lock file using public npmrc' && false)
scripts.publish-prod: yarn build && yarn test-fast && npm publish
scripts.publish-beta: yarn build && yarn test-fast && npm publish --tag beta
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run test-node && npm run build && npm run test-dist &&  npm run collect-metrics && npm run test-browser-puppet
scripts.test-ci: npm run lint && npm run build && npm run test-node && npm run test-dist &&  npm run collect-metrics
scripts.test-cover: NODE_ENV=test tape -r babel-register test/node.js && nyc report
scripts.test-dist: npm run build-es6 && node test/start.js test-dist
scripts.test-shader: npm run build-dist && budo src/test/fp64-shader.spec.js:build/test-bundle.js --dir test --live --open --watch-glob '**/*.{html,css,scss,js,glsl}' -- -t babelify -t brfs-babel
scripts.test-size-es6: npm run build-es6 && NODE_ENV=production webpack --config test/webpack.config.js --env.import-nothing --env.analyze --env.es6
scripts.test-size-esm: npm run build-esm && NODE_ENV=production webpack --config test/webpack.config.js --env.import-nothing --env.analyze --env.esm
